titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Elaine Harger and John Bennett Collection on the Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies WAG.143
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Maggie Schreiner

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-11-20T10:57-0500

did.unittitle: Elaine Harger and John Bennett Collection on the Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Elaine Harger, the creator of this collection, were transferred to the Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive, New York University, in 1996. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Tamiment Library.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Donated by Elaine Harger in 1996. The accession number 1996.019 is associated with this gift.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Elaine Harger and John Bennett Collection on the Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies; TAM 143; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains materials pertaining to Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies at Empire State College, including the earliest years of the College, as well as the library. Also included are materials from the United University Professions-American Federation of Teachers and labor organizing at the school during the 1990s. There are also copies of the student newspaper, P.U.L.P.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Elaine Harger was a librarian at the Harry Van Arsdale School of Labor Studies at Empre State College-SUNY and the union representative to the United University Professions-American Federation of Teachers from 1989 to 1995.
